page.title: 07 Religion
page.content: Wickford, surprisingly has many churches for the size of the town. Most religions are closely linked to christianity for there are, for example, no Mosques, no Buddhist temples and no Synogogues.The religious buildings in Wickford are as follows: Three church of England,which are St. Catherines,St.Mary's and St.Andrews.Five Inter-Denominational churches which are the Jersey gardens chapel,The Salvation Army,Assembly of Godchurch,Wickford Gospel and the Evangelical church.There are two Baptist churches in Wickford as well as Christchurch which is a United reformed Methodists church. Although we have school assemblies when local reverends visit I don't feel that the younger generations are particularly religous.However older people of the town are.
